name: SNDX
purpose: This function returns a 4 character value representing the ‘sound’ of the field. These values can be used in comparing fields (see the DIFF() function also).

parts.description: The A type field to be converted. The original value is unchanged.

return_type: A A 4 character string is returned.
example:
? sndx(‘translate’)
T652
? sndx(‘trnslt’)
T652
? sndx(‘John’)
J500
? sndx(‘Paul’)
P400
